We'll provide you with a link instead: We'll provide you with a link instead

auth.confirm_end_guest_session: Biztosan be szeretné fejezni ezt a munkamenetet? Mivel Ön vendégfelhasználó, a munkamenet befejezése után nem tölthet fel további fájlokat.
auth.failed_to_accept_invite: Ez a meghívó kód érvénytelen. Lehet, hogy lejárt, már felhasználták, vagy a feladó visszavonta.
auth.failed_to_send_password_reset_email: Nem sikerült elküldeni a jelszó-visszaállító e-mailt
auth.forgot_password_create_password_descript: Kérjük, adja meg új jelszavát. A jelszónak és a jelszó megerősítésnek is egyeznie kell.
auth.guest_warning: A bal oldali űrlap segítségével feltöltött fájlokat közvetlenül az Önt meghívó személlyel osztja meg.
auth.invite_accepted: Visszafordított megosztás meghívó elfogadva. Mostantól feltölthet fájlokat.
auth.password_set_description: Jelszava beállítva. Egy pillanat múlva bejelentkezésre kerül.
auth.please_enter_email: Kérjük, adjon meg egy e-mail címet
auth.please_enter_email_and_password: Kérjük, adja meg az e-mail címét és jelszavát
auth.please_enter_email_to_reset_password: Kérjük, adja meg e-mail címét a jelszó visszaállításához
auth.please_enter_password_and_confirm_passwo: Kérjük, adjon meg egy jelszót és erősítse meg a jelszót

confirm_delete_user: Biztosan törölni szeretné ezt a felhasználót?

guest.upload_success_message: A fájlokat kérő személy e-mailt kap egy letöltési linkkel.

reverse_invite_send.error: Nem sikerült elküldeni a fordított megosztási meghívót

account.linked_accounts_description: Fiókja összekapcsolása külső szolgáltatóval az egyszerűbb bejelentkezés érdekében. Az összekapcsolás után közvetlenül bejelentkezhet a szolgáltató gombjának kiválasztásával a bejelentkezési képernyőn.
account.myProfile_description: E-mail címének frissítése vagy nevének megváltoztatása. Jelszavát a "Jelszavam megváltoztatása" gombra kattintva és az utasításokat követve módosíthatja.
account.name: Teljes nevem

branding.background_images_description: Egyedi háttérképek feltöltése az Unsplash alapértelmezett képeinek lecseréléséhez. A képek véletlenszerűen forognak beállított időközönként.
branding.background_slideshow_speed_description: Változtassa meg, milyen gyakran váltakozik véletlenszerűen a háttérkép (ez csak akkor van hatással, ha több háttérképe van). Állítsa 0-ra a diavetítés kikapcsolásához, és így minden oldalon friss, véletlenszerű képet jelenít majd meg helyette.
branding.delete_theme_description: A kiválasztott téma törlése. Ez eltávolítja a témák listájáról, és többé nem fogja tudni használni. Aktív téma vagy a beépített témák törlése nem lehetséges.
branding.download_theme_description: A kiválasztott téma letöltése JSON fájlként. Ez felhasználható új téma létrehozására vagy meglévő téma módosítására.
branding.install_custom_theme_description:
Egyedi téma telepítése JSON fájlból.

Ez lehet egy Ön által módosított vagy létrehozott téma, vagy egy letöltött téma.
branding.install_custom_theme_description_2: Ha letölt egy témát, győződjön meg arról, hogy megbízik a forrásban, és ellenőrizte a témát rosszindulatú kódok szempontjából, mielőtt telepítené.
branding.logo_description: Cége logójának megjelenítése PNG formátumban a bal felső sarokban. Állítsa be a kívánt szélességet pixelben – a magasság automatikusan igazodik az arány megtartásához. Használjon olyan forrásképet, amely legalább olyan széles, mint a kijelző szélessége a minőség biztosításához.
branding.select_theme_description: Válasszon a számos előre elkészített téma vagy az Ön által telepített téma közül.
branding.show_powered_by_description: A "Powered by Erugo" szöveg megjelenítése vagy elrejtése az oldal alján. Ez a szöveg lehetővé teszi, hogy az Erugo-t felfedezzék a felhasználók, és segít nekünk növekedni, azonban, ha szeretné, elrejtheti.
branding.theme_description: Válasszon a számos előre elkészített téma vagy az Ön által telepített téma közül.
branding.use_my_backgrounds_description: Használja az Ön által feltöltött háttereket. Ha nincs bejelölve, az Unsplash hátterek kerülnek felhasználásra.

confirm.pruneExpiredShares: Are you sure you want to delete your expired shares? This cannot be undone.

description.branding: Customise the UI of your Erugo instance and add your own branding.
description.system: Manage the behaviour of your Erugo instance.

emailTemplates.accountCreatedDescription: Sent to new users when a administrator creates their account. Contains a link that allows the user to set their password.
emailTemplates.baseTemplateDescription: Controls the base template from which all other templates inherit.

sections.fallbackTextDescription: For email clients that cannot properly display action buttons, we include a fallback link at the bottom of the email. Use this option to customize the text that appears above this fallback link, helping recipients understand its purpose.
sections.subject: Subject

error.pruneExpiredShares: Failed to schedule expired shares for deletion!

downloadLimit.description: You can set the download limit for any share by clicking the right-side number and typing in the new limit. Clear the box to remove the limit.
downloadLimit.description2: Changes will be saved automatically when you click outside the box.
downloadLimit.title: Download Limit Help

settings.noShares: You have no shares. Why not create one?

reverse_invite.description: Request files from a contact by entering their details below. They'll receive a link that grants one-time access to upload files directly to you. Once they've uploaded the files, you'll receive an email notification.

share.password_protect_description: Create a password for your share. Anyone downloading this share will need this password to access it. Please note: After creation, this password will be encrypted and we cannot retrieve it for you. Make sure to save it in a secure location.

success.pruneExpiredShares: Expired shares have been scheduled for deletion and will be processed in the background.

system.allow_chunked_uploads_description: Chunked upload mode breaks files into smaller segments that are transferred sequentially. While slightly slower than direct upload for smaller files, this method provides greater stability and reliability when transferring large files. Chunked uploads support progress tracking and allow users to manually pause and resume transfers, making it ideal for files over 100MB or when using unstable network connections.
system.allow_direct_uploads_description: Direct upload mode transmits files in a single, uninterrupted request. While this method offers the fastest transfer speeds for most files, extremely large files may cause stability issues or timeouts. For optimal performance with files exceeding 100MB, chunked uploads may be a better option.
system.allow_reverse_shares_description: Determines whether your registered users should have permission to send reverse share requests. These requests provide external individuals with a one-time upload pass, allowing them to deliver files directly to the registered user who initiated the request.
system.application_name_description: Customise the displayed name of your application that appears in title bars, dialogs, and other interface elements. This helps maintain consistent branding throughout the user experience.
system.application_url_description: The base URL of your application. This is used to create clickable links in notification emails, allowing users to navigate directly back to specific pages within the application.
system.auth_providers_description: Configure auth providers via which you wish your users to be able to authenticate.
system.auth_providers_description_localhost: External authentication configuration is unavailable on localhost. OAuth providers require a fully qualified domain name (FQDN) to properly function. Please access Erugo through a registered domain to configure these settings.
system.callback_url_description: Use the callback URL provided in your identity provider configuration.
system.chunked_uploads_disabled_but_default: You have set the default upload mode to chunked, but chunked uploads are disabled!
system.clean_files_after_description: How long after a share expires before files are deleted from the system.
system.default_language_description: Set the primary language that will be used throughout the application interface for all users by default. Individual users can override this setting with their personal preferences.
system.default_upload_mode_description: Set which mode should be selected by default. Users can change this when creating a share if you have more than one method enabled.
system.direct_uploads_disabled_but_default: You have set the default upload mode to direct, but direct uploads are disabled!
system.login_message_description: Add a custom message or announcement that will be displayed on the login screen. This can be used for welcome messages, important notifications, or temporary announcements.
system.max_expiry_time_description: Set the maximum number of days a user can select for share expiry upon creation. Empty the value to allow unlimited expiry time.
system.max_share_size_description: Set the maximum size of a share that a user can create. The value is in megabytes or gigabytes.
system.provider_trust_warning_description: Ensure you only configure and enable auth providers that you trust. Authentication providers have elevated access privileges to your application and user data. Adding untrusted or compromised providers could lead to unauthorised access, data breaches, or account takeovers.
system.share_deleted_emails_description: Notify users when their shares have been permanently deleted from the system. This confirms the completion of the content lifecycle for security and compliance purposes.
system.share_deletion_warning_emails_descriptio: Provide advance notice to users when their expired shares are scheduled for permanent deletion. This gives them a final opportunity to save important content.
system.share_downloaded_emails_description: Notify share owners when their shared content is downloaded for the first time. This helps users track when recipients access their shared files.
system.share_expired_warning_emails_description: Alert users when their shares have reached their expiration date and are no longer accessible to recipients. Helps users maintain awareness of their sharing status.
system.share_expiry_warning_emails_description: Send proactive notifications to users when their shares are approaching expiration. This gives them the opportunity to extend access if needed.
system.show_language_selector_description: Toggle the visibility of the language selection dropdown in the top right corner of the application. When enabled, users can quickly switch between available interface languages.
system.smtp_host_description: The server address for your outgoing email service. This is used to send notifications and other system emails to users.
system.smtp_password_description: The password used to authenticate with your SMTP server. This credential allows your app to send emails through your email service provider.
system.smtp_port_description: The port number used to connect to your SMTP server. Common ports include 25 (standard), 465 (SSL), and 587 (TLS).
system.smtp_sender_address_description: The email address that will be used as the sender for all system emails. This address should be valid and properly configured with your SMTP service.
system.smtp_sender_name_description: The display name that will appear as the sender of system emails. Users will see this name in their email client (e.g. "Your App Name" or "Your App Support").
system.smtp_username_description: The username required to authenticate with your SMTP server. This is typically the email address or account name associated with your email service.

users.add_user_description: We'll send an email to the user with a link to set their password.
users.admin_help_text_2: User will have the same privileges as you.
users.leave_blank_to_keep_same_password: Leave blank to keep same password.
users.link_provider_confirm: Really link your account to this provider?
users.name: Name
users.password_confirmation_mismatch: Password and Password Confirmation must match
users.password_min_length: Password must be at least {length} characters long.
users.provider_unlink_failed: Failed to unlink the provider from your account
users.provider_unlinked: The provider has been unlinked from your account
users.unlink_provider_confirm: Really unlink your account from this provider?

setup.intro: Thank you for installing Erugo! Create your first admin user to get started.

download.password_required: You must enter the password to download this share.

share.download_limit_reached.message: The share you are trying to download has reached its download limit. Please ask the share creator to increase the download limit.
share.expired.message: The share you are trying to download has expired. Please ask the share creator to create a new share.
share.expires.in: Expires in {days} {days, plural, one {day} other {days}}, {hours} {hours, plural, one {hour} other {hours}}, {minutes} {minutes, plural, one {minute} other {minutes}}
share.not_found: The share you are looking for was not found. You may need to log in to see it.

upload.upload_mode_not_supported: No valid upload mode is selected! We're not sure what to suggest because this shouldn't be possible.

uploader.expiry_too_long: The expiry time you entered exceeds the maximum limit. We've automatically adjusted it to the longest period allowed.
uploader.guest_share_created: Thank you! Your files have been sent successfully. In a few moments you will be logged out.
uploader.password_required: Password is required to protect share
